SA15n1260:4: ātmani cittaspandanapūrvau kriyābhilāpau dṛṣṭvā'nyatra tayordarśanādyadi spandanamanumīyeta,
SA15n1260:7: tacca kāyavāgvijñaptipratibhāsi jñānaṃ jñānāntaraspandanaveśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatyevaṃ na matam | [1-3]
SA15n1260:8: atha parajñānasya kriyānupalambhāt paradhīranumātuṃ na yujyata iti cet ?
SA15n1260:9: na; tulyatvāt paro'pi parajñānapūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati 'taḥ tenāpi tanna jñāyate | [4-5]
SA15n1260:11: ātmanaścittasya paravartinornimittatvānupapatteḥ paracittaṃ jñāyata iti cet |
SA15n1260:19: svacittaspandananimittake vijñaptipratibhāsinī jñāne cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahirmukhapratibhāsinī anyanimittadutpadyete | [6-12]
SA15n1260:25: tathā sati, avicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsabheda eva spandanapūrvako na bhavati |
SA15n1260:29: tena hyatra kriyāviśeṣamātreṇa spandanasya pratītiritī yujyate |
SA15n1260:39: tenāvaśyaṃ tau spandananimittakatvāt tadbhāve na bhavata iti vaktavyam |
SA15n1260:48: atha middhenopahatatvāt puruṣasya arthaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyata iti cet |
SA15n1260:50: atha svapne'pi jñānasyārthavattvāttadopalabhyamānā api parasantānā eveti cet |
SA15n1260:51: paraṃ prativigrahītuṃ yadi yuktyāgamarahitastathāvidho'sad vādaḥ samāśriyeta,
SA15n1260:52: tadā parābhimataṃ tasya parāyattatvaṃ na ko'pi nivārayet |
SA15n1260:53: etatkeṣañcinmata eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni jñānāni santānāntarāyattāni |
SA15n1260:55: kadācit svapne'pi tasya sākṣāt santānāntarayattā iṣṭaiva;
SA15n1260:60: tasya kāryatvaṃ tu cittāntare'pi tulyamiti kathanna jñāyate ?
SA15n1260:61: api ca, yadi tatkriyā svasattāmātreṇa svasantānaṃ pratyāyet ,
SA15n1260:64: tada tatra kimanayā paramparayā - paracittāt kriyā,
SA15n1260:69: spandanamātrasāmānyaṃ kriyābhilāpajñānasāmānyasya kāraṇatvāt kāryeṇa kāraṇasya gatiḥ |
SA15n1260:73: etayoḥ saḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svāpādyavasthāyāmitarasyāmapi ca samānaḥ |
SA15n1260:74: bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayāt paraspandanadinimittodbhūtavijñānavāsanaiva kadācitparābhogādeḥ vyavahitādapi vṛttiṃ labhate:
SA15n1260:77: kriyātaḥ spandanapratipattau svāpa itarasmiñca syātpratipattiratha vā naiva kadācana |
SA15n1260:88: tathā sati arthāntaravādahānyā ete'nekāśakyanigūhanadoṣaprasaṅgāḥ mahākṛcchrā uttereṇaikena nihatā bhavanti |[52-58]
SA15n1260:89: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ svamutthāpakacittasyānumānamiti nyāyyam |
SA15n1260:92: nocyate paracittasamutthitavijñaptirūpatvāttatra pratibhāsijñānena samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti |
SA15n1260:103: kiñca kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yatparacittajñānaṃ tatparacittaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna ?
SA15n1260:105: aviṣayatve tu kathaṃ jñānena paracittasattā pratīyate ?
SA15n1260:108: kriyāvāgbhyāṃ paracittaṃ pratipattimatāmapi tatsvarūpaviṣayīkaraṇe svacittajñānavat tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta |
SA15n1260:109: tadajñāne tu tena tatsvarūpasya grahaṇaṃ katham ? [65-67]
SA15n1260:110: atha liṅgāt sāmānyadhigateḥ nākārasya pratītiriti cet ?
SA15n1260:116: tathā sati tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasahyeta ityuktam | [86-71]
SA15n1260:127: tatpravartanadvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttau tadādhipatyādāgārthasya prāpteḥ |
SA15n1260:134: tatra vijñaptijñānaṃ na kadāciccittaspandanādhipatyena vinā udbhavatītyataḥ tābhyāṃ ye anumīyate |
SA15n1260:138: tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanādhipatyādudayaḥ tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi |
SA15n1260:140: tatrāpi yādṛganumānaṃ tādṛgavisaṃvādo vyavahāraścāpyastyeveti kenāpi na gṛhyate | [82-86]
SA15n1260:147: kathaṃ nāma pratyakṣeṇārthasvarūpasya agrahaṇaṃ ca bhavati |
SA15n1260:156: te'pi tadākārasadṛśasvacittapratibhāsameva jānantītyevamavadhāraṇād paracittavida iti vyavahāraḥ |
